source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.
source_objects.title: Creativity

items.title: How To Create Great Characters For Your Novel or Screenplay
items.headline: Writing course from NY Times-praised authors, book editors and writing coaches to help you create compelling characters
objectives_summary: How to craft compelling characters for a novel, screenplay or graphic novel
Gain an understanding of how conflict creates dynamic and memorable fiction characters
How to create situations for your characters that illuminate their strengths and weaknesses

items.title: Beginners Screenwriting in the Digital and Streaming Age
items.headline: Learn how to write dynamic scripts that get into festivals, get optioned and sold from an Experienced Writer!
objectives_summary: How to write dynamic screenplays for the Digital and Streaming Age, the do's and don'ts of dialogue, proper formatting
Complete understanding of story structure, Creating potent loglines, writing treatment to flesh out complex story concepts
Using Outlines & Beatsheets to write your first draft quickly, the importance of setting, the meaning of theme

items.title: Golden Lies: Be Creative and Get ANYTHING you want in life!

visible_instructors.title: Becky Shortt
visible_instructors.name: Becky
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO of School Savvy and Becky Shortt Coaching

items.headline: Master your natural creativity and transform your life! Simply apply the 'Golden Lie' and enjoy your fulfilling life!
objectives_summary: Write to heal yourself, solve-problems and build your dream life.
Create art easily and meaningful to transform yourself and the world around you.
Lovingly manipulate your environment to promote productivity and creativity.

items.title: Mandala Art Workshop [ 3 videos + bonus session ]
items.headline: Learn Mandala from Scratch
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw your own Mandalas (Beginner to intermediate)

items.title: Ultimately Simplified  Approach for Animal Cloning
items.headline: Can it be done in your garage? You will be surprised! Yes. Learn the principles and ways for simple realizations.
objectives_summary: Understand the basic mechanism of animal cloning and learn how simple ways exist to realize this seemingly mysterious procedure.
Understand achievements, potentials, limits and perspectives of somatic cell nuclear transfer

items.title: Write Every Day
items.headline: Start and Maintain a Daily Writing Habit
objectives_summary: Create a regular writing practice
Build a body of work
Develop the consistent practice needed to improve the quality of your writing and grow your voice/style

items.title: The Ultimate Origami Course - Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Learn the basics then advance your skills as you learn to fold 100 origami designs
objectives_summary: Fold 100 origami designs
Understand the fundamentals and folding techniques
Fold animals, flowers, boats, buildings, modular origami, action models, and much more

items.title: The Stories of Our Lives

visible_instructors.name: Beth
visible_instructors.title: Beth Kephart
visible_instructors.job_title: Memoirist, Teacher, Partner at Juncture Workshops

items.headline: reading and writing memoir
objectives_summary: Apply the lessons of extraordinary memoirists to your own life and writing.
Build your personal library with recommended classics and brand-new memoirs.
Create your own writing journal, with the help of our writing prompts and guide.

items.title: Beginners Guide to Critiquing Films
items.headline: An easy guide to discovering the art of critique.
objectives_summary: This course was designed or created in order to teach prospective students the art of critiquing filmography. The course materials however goes further than merely film and stimulates students to critically evaluating numerous things in their surroundings constructively, as well as objectively. It inspires creative thinking within each individual to an extent they choose to develop it.

items.title: Self-publish a SmashWords eBook: Non-Amazon Self-publishing
items.headline: SmashWords: self-publishing ebooks everywhere but Amazon Kindle via KDP.  Self-publish on Apple, B&N, Kobo and Scribd!
objectives_summary: Understand what Smashwords is and how it works
Determine whether Smashwords publishing is for you
Learn to format your manuscript for Smashwords publication

items.title: Memoir Writing: Beginner Lessons to an Inspirational Book

visible_instructors.name: Valeria
visible_instructors.title: Valeria Teles
visible_instructors.job_title: Uncovering Your Inner Peace and Joy

items.headline: Discover how to confidently outline, write, edit and publish your personal stories and/or memoir.
objectives_summary: Gain confidence to become the writer of a meaningful and inspiring book.
Learn how to identify the right reasons to write your book.
Take your own ideas and life experiences and turn them into a compelling topic for a book.

items.title: How to FAQ the coder's brain?

visible_instructors.title: Elena Davydkina
visible_instructors.name: Elena
visible_instructors.job_title: Unleashing potential, Peak performance, Positive psychology

items.headline: How to become a creative coder?Learn creativity & coder's personality. Boost creativity through sensual art& positivity.
objectives_summary: You will become aware of personality traits that help coders succeed
You will learn how to increase brain plasticity to become more creative
You will understand why merging of technology and art is important for creativity& innovation

items.title: How to Create, Package and Pitch a Reality TV Show
items.headline: Creating unscripted content for television
objectives_summary: Create a reality show Pitch Package including Title, Logline, Treatment and sizzle reel. Know how to connect with industry professionals and how to verbally pitch your idea to industry executives in person.  Know what to look for in an option agreement and also the do's and don'ts of pitching in Hollywood.

items.title: The Science of Creativity
items.headline: Take Complete Control Over Your Creativity
objectives_summary: Psychology of Creativity
Creativity & Innovation Strategies
The Creative Process

items.title: Therapeutic Art: Self Exploration

visible_instructors.name: Anya
visible_instructors.title: Anya Walsh
visible_instructors.job_title: Spiritual Teacher, Yoga Instructor, Meditation Guide

items.headline: An Introductory Course to Find Your True Self
objectives_summary: How you can become who you want to be... who your soul wants to be
Embark on the journey to discover who you TRULY are
To see the beauty in your "imperfections" and love yourself

items.title: The 20 Minute Writer: Building a Writing Practice that Works
items.headline: A small, regular commitment to writing can lead to big results.
objectives_summary: How to build a realistic, regular and sustainable writing practice that works for your life.
How to conquer the inner and outer obstacles that get in the way of our writing.
How to manage writer's block.
